What best describes the complexity of build on this site?
Complex if one or more of the following:
Difficult Access/storage
MMC to walls/roof 
Basement/podium deck
Proprietary Green/Brown/Blue roof
Non-conventional construction
High Rise 6+ storey
Exposed location
Made/filled ground
Contamination
